This is surprisingly well lit for an
underground waterway.

けっこう明るいですね。

surface, even.

flowing, though.

when our warning alarm lights up.

damn tired I feel.

engChrName: I'm not very fond of the musty smell in the air, though. This certainly isn't a very comfortable place to linger.
engSearchText:
I'm not very fond of the musty smell in the
air, though. This certainly isn't a very comfortable
place to linger.
jpnChrName: しかし、微かにかび臭いというか…… 中々に居心地のいいものではないな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、微かにかび臭いというか……
中々に居心地のいいものではないな。

engChrName: We're here to keep you alive, not comfortable. Besides, it's a waterway, what were you expecting?
engSearchText:
We're here to keep you alive, not comfortable.
Besides, it's a waterway, what were you expecting?
jpnChrName: そりゃ地下水路だからな。 居心地の悪さまでは面倒を見きれないぜ？
jpnSearchText:
そりゃ地下水路だからな。
居心地の悪さまでは面倒を見きれないぜ？

engChrName: Haha. Don't worry, I know. Let's just take care of business and get out of here as soon as possible.
engSearchText:
Haha. Don't worry, I know. Let's just take care of
business and get out of here as soon as possible.
jpnChrName: はは、分かっているさ。 早い所用事を済ませて出るとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
はは、分かっているさ。
早い所用事を済ませて出るとしよう。

engChrName: So, where exactly are we takin' you?
engSearchText: So, where exactly are we takin' you?
jpnChrName: ……で、肝心の目的地はどっちの方向なんだ？
jpnSearchText: ……で、肝心の目的地はどっちの方向なんだ？

engChrName: I'm here to find a specific mural.
engSearchText: I'm here to find a specific mural.
jpnChrName: まず、私が探しているものは“壁画”なのだ。
jpnSearchText: まず、私が探しているものは“壁画”なのだ。

engChrName: It's closely connected to the history of the Septian Church and should be somewhere in the eastern part of these passages.
engSearchText:
It's closely connected to the history of the Septian
Church and should be somewhere in the eastern part
of these passages.
jpnChrName: 七耀教会に関連の深いものだそうで、 この水路の東に位置しているという。
jpnSearchText:
七耀教会に関連の深いものだそうで、
この水路の東に位置しているという。

engChrName: Understood. We'll try and head in that direction, then.
engSearchText:
Understood. We'll try and head in that
direction, then.
jpnChrName: 分かりました、それでは 東の方角を目指しましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
分かりました、それでは
東の方角を目指しましょうか。

engChrName: We will see that you arrive safely at your destination.
engSearchText: We will see that you arrive safely at your destination.
jpnChrName: さて、それでは目的地まで 護衛させて頂きましょう。
jpnSearchText:
さて、それでは目的地まで
護衛させて頂きましょう。

engChrName: I shall stay close behind you to ensure that no monsters attack from the rear.
engSearchText:
I shall stay close behind you to ensure that no
monsters attack from the rear.
jpnChrName: イニゴ様の背後はわたくしが 護衛させていただきますので。
jpnSearchText:
イニゴ様の背後はわたくしが
護衛させていただきますので。

engChrName: I'll stand guard on the flank, then!
engSearchText: I'll stand guard on the flank, then!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、わたしが横を警戒しますね！
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ、わたしが横を警戒しますね！

engChrName: There's no need to overdo the protection, young ladies.
engSearchText:
There's no need to overdo the protection,
young ladies.
jpnChrName: おっと……そこまで厳重に 護衛してくれなくても大丈夫だ。
jpnSearchText:
おっと……そこまで厳重に
護衛してくれなくても大丈夫だ。

engChrName: I do want to have a little freedom to walk around and take in the sights. I just don't want to end up surrounded by a horde of monsters.
engSearchText:
I do want to have a little freedom to walk around and
take in the sights. I just don't want to end up
surrounded by a horde of monsters.
jpnChrName: 道中も地下水路を見学しながら ある程度自由に歩きたいからな。
jpnSearchText:
道中も地下水路を見学しながら
ある程度自由に歩きたいからな。

engChrName: Have it your way. We'll just follow along and keep an eye out on all sides, then.
engSearchText:
Have it your way. We'll just follow along and keep an
eye out on all sides, then.
jpnChrName: アンタがそう言うなら従うぜ。 俺達は各自警戒しつつやっていくとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
アンタがそう言うなら従うぜ。
俺達は各自警戒しつつやっていくとしよう。

engChrName: I will respect our client's wishes.
engSearchText: I will respect our client's wishes.
jpnChrName: ええ……かしこまりました。
jpnSearchText: ええ……かしこまりました。

engChrName: Try not to get separated from us, though.
engSearchText: Try not to get separated from us, though.
jpnChrName: あんまりはぐれないようにして下さいねっ。
jpnSearchText: あんまりはぐれないようにして下さいねっ。

engChrName: All right, that settles that. Let's head on eastward.
engSearchText: All right, that settles that. Let's head on eastward.
jpnChrName: よし、話もまとまった事だし 東の方角を目指していくかね。
jpnSearchText:
よし、話もまとまった事だし
東の方角を目指していくかね。

engChrName: Thanks! I'm counting on you guys.
engSearchText: Thanks! I'm counting on you guys.
jpnChrName: ああ、よろしく頼む！
jpnSearchText: ああ、よろしく頼む！

engChrName: (Umm... Van? I'm not so sure about Inigo...)
engSearchText: (Umm... Van? I'm not so sure about Inigo...)
jpnChrName: （ヴァンさん、あの……   イニゴさんの事なんですけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（ヴァンさん、あの……
イニゴさんの事なんですけど。）

engChrName: (I realize this is rude to say about a client, but something seems...off about him.)
engSearchText:
(I realize this is rude to say about a client, but
something seems...off about him.)
jpnChrName: （こんな事を言ったら失礼ですが、   どこか違和感があると言いますか……）
jpnSearchText:
（こんな事を言ったら失礼ですが、
どこか違和感があると言いますか……）

engChrName: (It ain't just you.)
engSearchText: (It ain't just you.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、分かってる。）
jpnSearchText: （ああ、分かってる。）

engChrName: (I'll keep an eye on him for now. You make sure to do the same.)
engSearchText:
(I'll keep an eye on him for now. You make sure to do
the same.)
jpnChrName: （まず様子を見るとしようぜ。   ……お前の方でも目を離さねえようにな。）
jpnSearchText:
（まず様子を見るとしようぜ。
……お前の方でも目を離さねえようにな。）

engChrName: (Understood.)
engSearchText: (Understood.)

engChrName: (Hmph.)
engSearchText: (Hmph.)

engChrName: (...Hmm? What's up with everyone? Why does it feel like I'm the only one out of the loop?)
engSearchText:
(...Hmm? What's up with everyone? Why does it feel
like I'm the only one out of the loop?)
jpnChrName: （……？　皆さんどうしたんでしょうか。   なんだか仲間外れにされているような……？）
jpnSearchText:
（……？　皆さんどうしたんでしょうか。
なんだか仲間外れにされているような……？）

engChrName: Quest Archaeological Expedition started!
engSearchText: Quest Archaeological Expedition started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【地下水路の考古学的調査】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>地下水路の考古学的調査<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: Hmm... We've come a fair way now, but there's still no sign of the mural we're looking for.
engSearchText:
Hmm... We've come a fair way now, but there's still
no sign of the mural we're looking for.
jpnChrName: 大分奥まで進んで来ましたけど…… まだ目的地は見えてきませんね。
jpnSearchText:
大分奥まで進んで来ましたけど……
まだ目的地は見えてきませんね。

engChrName: Yeah, you're right. You'd think we would've seen it by now.
engSearchText:
Yeah, you're right. You'd think we would've seen it
by now.
jpnChrName: そうですね、そろそろ着いても いい頃だと思うんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、そろそろ着いても
いい頃だと思うんですけど。

engChrName: Quite so. I'd be lost if I were on my own—these corridors all look the same.
engSearchText:
Quite so. I'd be lost if I were on my own—these
corridors all look the same.
jpnChrName: ふぅ全く……似た景色ばかりで 道に迷ってしまいそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ全く……似た景色ばかりで
道に迷ってしまいそうだな。

engChrName: Looks like something's found its way to us, though.
engSearchText: Looks like something's found its way to us, though.
jpnChrName: おっと、どうやらタダじゃ 通らせてくれないらしい。
jpnSearchText:
おっと、どうやらタダじゃ
通らせてくれないらしい。

engChrName: Please stay back, sir.
engSearchText: Please stay back, sir.
jpnChrName: イニゴ様はお下がりを。
jpnSearchText: イニゴ様はお下がりを。

engChrName: This just got a bit more fun.
engSearchText: This just got a bit more fun.
jpnChrName: 面白くなって来たじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: 面白くなって来たじゃねえか。

engChrName: Let's take 'em down, guys!
engSearchText: Let's take 'em down, guys!
jpnChrName: 行くぞお前ら、サクッと片付けるぞ！
jpnSearchText: 行くぞお前ら、サクッと片付けるぞ！

engChrName: That was the last of them.
engSearchText: That was the last of them.
jpnChrName: 掃討、完了しました。
jpnSearchText: 掃討、完了しました。

engChrName: Yeah. Good job, everyone.
engSearchText: Yeah. Good job, everyone.
jpnChrName: ああ、ご苦労さんだったな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、ご苦労さんだったな。

engChrName: (Hmm... I know I wanted someone strong to escort me here, but these people might fit the bill a little too well.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... I know I wanted someone strong to escort
me here, but these people might fit the bill a little
too well.)
jpnChrName: （護衛としては十分だが、   思いのほか腕が立ちすぎるな……）
jpnSearchText:
（護衛としては十分だが、
思いのほか腕が立ちすぎるな……）

engChrName: (Still, even they will be no match for—)
engSearchText: (Still, even they will be no match for—)
jpnChrName: （だがまあ、あれを使えば奴らも……）
jpnSearchText: （だがまあ、あれを使えば奴らも……）

engChrName: Is something wrong?
engSearchText: Is something wrong?
jpnChrName: ……どうかしましたか？
jpnSearchText: ……どうかしましたか？

engChrName: Oh, did I space out? I'm sorry, I was just amazed by how capable you all are!
engSearchText:
Oh, did I space out? I'm sorry, I was just amazed by
how capable you all are!
jpnChrName: いいや、ただの独り言だ。 それよりも君たちは凄いな……！
jpnSearchText:
いいや、ただの独り言だ。
それよりも君たちは凄いな……！

engChrName: There were so many of those monsters, and yet you made defeating them look almost trivial! Not to mention, I'm completely unharmed.
engSearchText:
There were so many of those monsters, and yet you
made defeating them look almost trivial! Not to
mention, I'm completely unharmed.
jpnChrName: 魔獣が多かったというのに、余裕すら感じられる。 私もこの通り無傷で済んだしな。
jpnSearchText:
魔獣が多かったというのに、余裕すら感じられる。
私もこの通り無傷で済んだしな。

engChrName: I can see I did well by hiring you.
engSearchText: I can see I did well by hiring you.
jpnChrName: やはり君たちに依頼を頼んで正解だったようだ。
jpnSearchText: やはり君たちに依頼を頼んで正解だったようだ。

engChrName: Thank you for saying so, sir.
engSearchText: Thank you for saying so, sir.
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: ありがとうございます。

engChrName: It looked trivial 'cause it was. I was hoping for them to put up a bit more of a fight than that.
engSearchText:
It looked trivial 'cause it was. I was hoping for them
to put up a bit more of a fight than that.
jpnChrName: この程度が相手じゃ 物足りねえくらいだがな。
jpnSearchText:
この程度が相手じゃ
物足りねえくらいだがな。

engChrName: That's the spirit. Now let's get back on track.
engSearchText: That's the spirit. Now let's get back on track.
jpnChrName: おう、その意気で頼むぜ。 それじゃ気を取り直して先に進むか。
jpnSearchText:
おう、その意気で頼むぜ。
それじゃ気を取り直して先に進むか。

engChrName: (That feels like...)
engSearchText: (That feels like...)
jpnChrName: （この気配は…………）
jpnSearchText: （この気配は…………）

engChrName: Here we go. Took a bit longer than I was hopin', but this is the eastmost part of the waterways.
engSearchText:
Here we go. Took a bit longer than I was hopin', but
this is the eastmost part of the waterways.
jpnChrName: さてと──少しかかっちまったが ここが東側の最奥だな。
jpnSearchText:
さてと──少しかかっちまったが
ここが東側の最奥だな。

engChrName: It looks the same as everywhere else we've passed, though...
engSearchText:
It looks the same as everywhere else we've
passed, though...
jpnChrName: 見た感じだと、道中の景色と そんなに変わりありませんね。
jpnSearchText:
見た感じだと、道中の景色と
そんなに変わりありませんね。

engChrName: Yeah. Where's this mural we came to find?
engSearchText: Yeah. Where's this mural we came to find?
jpnChrName: 最奥には壁画があるっつう話じゃなかったか？
jpnSearchText: 最奥には壁画があるっつう話じゃなかったか？

engChrName: I'm wondering the same thing. The texts clearly indicate that it's meant to be here.
engSearchText:
I'm wondering the same thing. The texts clearly
indicate that it's meant to be here.
jpnChrName: ああ……だが、文献によれば間違いなく この場にあるはずなのだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……だが、文献によれば間違いなく
この場にあるはずなのだ。

engChrName: The water flowing through that grate leads beneath the temple, you see.
engSearchText:
The water flowing through that grate leads beneath
the temple, you see.
jpnChrName: そこの格子の水路の先は 七耀寺院の地下に繋がっていてな。
jpnSearchText:
そこの格子の水路の先は
七耀寺院の地下に繋がっていてな。

engChrName: That sacred area has been a key location since antiquity, and so there should absolutely be a mural here somewhere.
engSearchText:
That sacred area has been a key location since
antiquity, and so there should absolutely be a mural
here somewhere.
jpnChrName: 神聖な場所──つまり古代の要所でもあったのだ。 故に必ずどこかに壁画があるはずなのだが。
jpnSearchText:
神聖な場所──つまり古代の要所でもあったのだ。
故に必ずどこかに壁画があるはずなのだが。

engChrName: Since we came all this way, could I trouble you to help me find it?
engSearchText:
Since we came all this way, could I trouble you to
help me find it?
jpnChrName: 済まないが、君たちにも 探してもらう事は可能だろうか？
jpnSearchText:
済まないが、君たちにも
探してもらう事は可能だろうか？

engChrName: Sure—is what I'd say if you were any other client.
engSearchText: Sure—is what I'd say if you were any other client.
jpnChrName: ああ、仕方ねえな──といいたい所だが。
jpnSearchText: ああ、仕方ねえな──といいたい所だが。

engChrName: But you're just trying to distract us so you can call your goons to finish us off, aren't you?
engSearchText:
But you're just trying to distract us so you can call
your goons to finish us off, aren't you?
jpnChrName: そうやって俺達の注意を逸らした所で、 仲間を呼んで俺達を始末するつもりなのか？
jpnSearchText:
そうやって俺達の注意を逸らした所で、
仲間を呼んで俺達を始末するつもりなのか？

engChrName: Wh-What?
engSearchText: Wh-What?
jpnChrName: な、なんだと……？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだと……？

engChrName: I sense four people lying in wait.
engSearchText: I sense four people lying in wait.
jpnChrName: この気配は── 伏兵４人と言った所でしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
この気配は──
伏兵４人と言った所でしょうか。

engChrName: I sense three people lying in wait.
engSearchText: I sense three people lying in wait.
jpnChrName: この気配は── 伏兵３人と言った所でしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
この気配は──
伏兵３人と言った所でしょうか。

engChrName: I sense two people lying in wait.
engSearchText: I sense two people lying in wait.
jpnChrName: この気配は── 伏兵２人と言った所でしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
この気配は──
伏兵２人と言った所でしょうか。

engChrName: If you thought we were getting strung along for real, you've got another thing coming.
engSearchText:
If you thought we were getting strung along for real,
you've got another thing coming.
jpnChrName: 俺達を騙せてると思ってたなら おめでたい野郎だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
俺達を騙せてると思ってたなら
おめでたい野郎だぜ。

engChrName: How rude. I have no idea what spurred this on, but I don't appreciate being treated like a criminal.
engSearchText:
How rude. I have no idea what spurred this on, but I
don't appreciate being treated like a criminal.
jpnChrName: 急に何の話をしているのか分からないが…… 私を犯罪者扱いとは、失礼じゃないかね。
jpnSearchText:
急に何の話をしているのか分からないが……
私を犯罪者扱いとは、失礼じゃないかね。

engChrName: Have I offended you in some way?
engSearchText: Have I offended you in some way?
jpnChrName: 何か気に障る事でもあっただろうか？
jpnSearchText: 何か気に障る事でもあっただろうか？

engChrName: Nah. I only played along with the bit because I couldn't pin down what you were really after at first.
engSearchText:
Nah. I only played along with the bit because I
couldn't pin down what you were really after at first.
jpnChrName: いいや？　ただアンタの目的が読めなくて ここまで泳がせてもらった訳だが……
jpnSearchText:
いいや？　ただアンタの目的が読めなくて
ここまで泳がせてもらった訳だが……

engChrName: But you just gave the game away. You're out to steal from the area under the temple you just mentioned, aren't you?
engSearchText:
But you just gave the game away. You're out to steal
from the area under the temple you just mentioned,
aren't you?
jpnChrName: さっきの話しぶりで大分読めて来た。 目的は“盗み”──七耀寺院の地下が狙いだな？
jpnSearchText:
さっきの話しぶりで大分読めて来た。
目的は“盗み”──七耀寺院の地下が狙いだな？

engChrName: From what I've heard, all manner of artifacts 'n' offerings get stored in places like that.
engSearchText:
From what I've heard, all manner of artifacts 'n'
offerings get stored in places like that.
jpnChrName: あそこには奉納品やら聖遺物やらが 置かれてるっつう話だもんな。
jpnSearchText:
あそこには奉納品やら聖遺物やらが
置かれてるっつう話だもんな。

engChrName: You're planning to sneak in there through that grate.
engSearchText: You're planning to sneak in there through that grate.
jpnChrName: そこの格子の先を抜けて潜り込もうって魂胆か。
jpnSearchText: そこの格子の先を抜けて潜り込もうって魂胆か。

engChrName: You weren't lying about needing us to escort you this far.
engSearchText:
You weren't lying about needing us to escort you
this far.
jpnChrName: そして私達は、この場所に安全に辿り着く為の ていのいい護衛役……
jpnSearchText:
そして私達は、この場所に安全に辿り着く為の
ていのいい護衛役……

engChrName: But now that we've cleared the path, you don't need us any longer.
engSearchText:
But now that we've cleared the path, you don't need
us any longer.
jpnChrName: 目的地にたどり着いたら、 もうお役御免という事ですね。
jpnSearchText:
目的地にたどり着いたら、
もうお役御免という事ですね。

engChrName: We are well aware that your identity as an archaeologist is fraudulent as well.
engSearchText:
We are well aware that your identity as an
archaeologist is fraudulent as well.
jpnChrName: 勿論、考古学者という身分が 偽りの物であるという事も承知しています。
jpnSearchText:
勿論、考古学者という身分が
偽りの物であるという事も承知しています。

engChrName: I would suggest that you put a little more effort into maintaining your cover in your future attempts.
engSearchText:
I would suggest that you put a little more effort into
maintaining your cover in your future attempts.
jpnChrName: もう少しそれらしい嘘のつき方を 練習された方がよろしいかと。
jpnSearchText:
もう少しそれらしい嘘のつき方を
練習された方がよろしいかと。

engChrName: Haha... Hahaha!
engSearchText: Haha... Hahaha!
jpnChrName: ハッ……ハハハハッ！
jpnSearchText: ハッ……ハハハハッ！

engChrName: I see you're not just stronger than I was hoping for, but smarter, too. What a shame.
engSearchText:
I see you're not just stronger than I was hoping for,
but smarter, too. What a shame.
jpnChrName: もう少し頭の悪い連中だと 相手がしやすくて助かったんだがな。
jpnSearchText:
もう少し頭の悪い連中だと
相手がしやすくて助かったんだがな。

engChrName: Yet despite seeing through me, you were still foolish to come all this way with the eldest of the Devancy Brothers...
engSearchText:
Yet despite seeing through me, you were still foolish
to come all this way with the eldest of the
Devancy Brothers...
jpnChrName: そこまで分かっていながら、ディバンシー兄弟の 長兄たる私に付いて来るとは……
jpnSearchText:
そこまで分かっていながら、ディバンシー兄弟の
長兄たる私に付いて来るとは……

engChrName: Heh. Guess it's possible to be clever and stupid at the same time.
engSearchText:
Heh. Guess it's possible to be clever and stupid at the
same time.
jpnChrName: クク、なんとも間抜けなことだ。
jpnSearchText: クク、なんとも間抜けなことだ。

engChrName: Come on out, guys!
engSearchText: Come on out, guys!
jpnChrName: 出て来いお前らッ！
jpnSearchText: <S5>出て来いお前らッ！

engChrName: So you're the spriggan, huh?
engSearchText: So you're the spriggan, huh?
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋とか言ったか。
jpnSearchText: 裏解決屋とか言ったか。

engChrName: You look pretty tough, but this was over the second you took the job!
engSearchText:
You look pretty tough, but this was over the second
you took the job!
jpnChrName: 中々腕が立つみてえだが、 依頼を受けたのが運の尽きだったな！
jpnSearchText:
中々腕が立つみてえだが、
依頼を受けたのが運の尽きだったな！

engChrName: We're not gonna go easy on you, even if you got women and kids with you.
engSearchText:
We're not gonna go easy on you, even if you got
women and kids with you.
jpnChrName: 女やガキもいるみてえだが 全員まとめて袋叩きにしてやるぜ！
jpnSearchText:
女やガキもいるみてえだが
全員まとめて袋叩きにしてやるぜ！

engChrName: I haven't forgotten about what you did to me yesterday, and you're gonna pay for it!
engSearchText:
I haven't forgotten about what you did to me
yesterday, and you're gonna pay for it!
jpnChrName: 昨日は世話になったな。 今度こそは確実に仕留めてやるよ！
jpnSearchText:
昨日は世話になったな。
今度こそは確実に仕留めてやるよ！

engChrName: I haven't forgotten about what you did to me yesterday.
engSearchText:
I haven't forgotten about what you did to
me yesterday.
jpnChrName: 昨日は世話になったな。
jpnSearchText: 昨日は世話になったな。

engChrName: Luckily my brother managed to forge release papers for me and pull some strings.
engSearchText:
Luckily my brother managed to forge release papers
for me and pull some strings.
jpnChrName: 兄貴が保釈命令を偽造した上で うまいこと手回ししてくれてな。
jpnSearchText:
兄貴が保釈命令を偽造した上で
うまいこと手回ししてくれてな。

engChrName: So I'm out on good behavior! Can't guarantee I'll behave, though.
engSearchText:
So I'm out on good behavior! Can't guarantee I'll
behave, though.
jpnChrName: おかげでシャバに出て来れたぜ。
jpnSearchText: おかげでシャバに出て来れたぜ。

engChrName: Psh. Talk about not knowin' when to quit.
engSearchText: Psh. Talk about not knowin' when to quit.
jpnChrName: チッ……しつこい野郎だ。
jpnSearchText: チッ……しつこい野郎だ。

engChrName: I've got a score to settle with you, too.
engSearchText: I've got a score to settle with you, too.
jpnChrName: 弟と同じく昨日はやってくれたな。
jpnSearchText: 弟と同じく昨日はやってくれたな。

engChrName: My brother bailed me out after the guild handed me over to the police, so here I am.
engSearchText:
My brother bailed me out after the guild handed me
over to the police, so here I am.
jpnChrName: ギルドから警察に移送された後、 俺も兄貴のおかげで出て来られてな。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドから警察に移送された後、
俺も兄貴のおかげで出て来られてな。

engChrName: Too bad you won't be interfering with the Devancy Brothers ever again. We'll see to that!
engSearchText:
Too bad you won't be interfering with the Devancy
Brothers ever again. We'll see to that!
jpnChrName: 俺達ディバンシー兄弟の邪魔はさせねえ。 大人しくここで消えちまいな──！
jpnSearchText:
俺達ディバンシー兄弟の邪魔はさせねえ。
大人しくここで消えちまいな──！

engChrName: I'm not gonna forget what you did to me last night.
engSearchText: I'm not gonna forget what you did to me last night.
jpnChrName: 昨日の夜の恨みは忘れねえ。
jpnSearchText: 昨日の夜の恨みは忘れねえ。

engChrName: I was thrown in a cell after the guild handed me over to the police...
engSearchText:
I was thrown in a cell after the guild handed me over
to the police...
jpnChrName: ギルドから警察に移送された後、 拘置所にぶちこまれちまったが……
jpnSearchText:
ギルドから警察に移送された後、
拘置所にぶちこまれちまったが……

jpnSearchText:
俺達ディバンシー兄弟の邪魔はさせねえ。
大人しくここで消えちまいな──！

engChrName: So there's three of you guys, huh? I figured it was just two—not that I give a shit either way.
engSearchText:
So there's three of you guys, huh? I figured it was just
two—not that I give a shit either way.
jpnChrName: どうでもいいが、お前ら三兄弟だったのかよ。 てっきり二人かと思ってたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
どうでもいいが、お前ら三兄弟だったのかよ。
てっきり二人かと思ってたぜ。

engChrName: This was your endgame, then? Run around town in disguise so you could eventually do this?
engSearchText:
This was your endgame, then? Run around town in
disguise so you could eventually do this?
jpnChrName: で……お前達が 街で変装してやがったのはこれが目的か。
jpnSearchText:
で……お前達が
街で変装してやがったのはこれが目的か。

engChrName: That's right. My brothers pretended to be a cop and a bracer to see just how well things in the city were guarded.
engSearchText:
That's right. My brothers pretended to be a cop and a
bracer to see just how well things in the city
were guarded.
jpnChrName: ああ、警察や遊撃士の警備体制を探るために “成りすまして”下調べを行っていた。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、警察や遊撃士の警備体制を探るために
“成りすまして”下調べを行っていた。

engChrName: The film festival here in Tharbad suddenly found itself in the limelight after the one in Messeldam was canceled...
engSearchText:
The film festival here in Tharbad suddenly found
itself in the limelight after the one in Messeldam
was canceled...
jpnChrName: メッセルダムの映画祭が中止になったことで 一気に注目度を増したサルバッド映画祭──
jpnSearchText:
メッセルダムの映画祭が中止になったことで
一気に注目度を増したサルバッド映画祭──

engChrName: There was no way they'd be able to send enough idiot cops to handle it on such short notice—and we're here to exploit that!
engSearchText:
There was no way they'd be able to send enough idiot
cops to handle it on such short notice—and we're
here to exploit that!
jpnChrName: 万全の体制とは言い難い状況を 利用しない手は無いからな！
jpnSearchText:
万全の体制とは言い難い状況を
利用しない手は無いからな！

engChrName: I knew it. So this is what you came all the way from Edith for.
engSearchText:
I knew it. So this is what you came all the way from
Edith for.
jpnChrName: やはり……そのために首都から やって来たという訳ですね。
jpnSearchText:
やはり……そのために首都から
やって来たという訳ですね。

engChrName: That's a whole lotta energy to burn for smalltime crap like this.
engSearchText:
That's a whole lotta energy to burn for smalltime crap
like this.
jpnChrName: しょうもねえ事にやる気出しやがって……
jpnSearchText: しょうもねえ事にやる気出しやがって……

engChrName: Well, whatever. Your game of dressup is about to come to an end.
engSearchText:
Well, whatever. Your game of dressup is about to
come to an end.
jpnChrName: だがまあいいさ、お前達の 変装ごっこもここまでだ。
jpnSearchText:
だがまあいいさ、お前達の
変装ごっこもここまでだ。

engChrName: The Devancy Brothers? I feel like I've heard that name somewhere before...
engSearchText:
The Devancy Brothers? I feel like I've heard that
name somewhere before...
jpnChrName: ディバンシー兄弟だと？ どこかで聞いた事があるような……
jpnSearchText:
ディバンシー兄弟だと？
どこかで聞いた事があるような……

engChrName: Well, whatever. Your game of dressup is about to come to an end.
engSearchText:
Well, whatever. Your game of dressup is about to
come to an end.
jpnChrName: まあいいさ、ともかくお前の 変装ごっこもここまでだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあいいさ、ともかくお前の
変装ごっこもここまでだ。

engChrName: Hmph. We were planning to take care of you ourselves, but I know from watching you that we're not up for the task.
engSearchText:
Hmph. We were planning to take care of you
ourselves, but I know from watching you that we're
not up for the task.
jpnChrName: フン……ここに来るまでの道中で、 お前達がかなり腕が立つ事は分かった。
jpnSearchText:
フン……ここに来るまでの道中で、
お前達がかなり腕が立つ事は分かった。

engChrName: But don't worry, we have a backup plan!
engSearchText: But don't worry, we have a backup plan!
jpnChrName: 俺達で敵わないのならば 別の相手を呼べばいいだけの事──！
jpnSearchText:
俺達で敵わないのならば
別の相手を呼べばいいだけの事──！

engChrName: A bomb?!
engSearchText: A bomb?!

engChrName: Not a chance!
engSearchText: Not a chance!
jpnChrName: させるかよ──！
jpnSearchText: させるかよ──！

engChrName: Wha—?!
engSearchText: Wha—?!

engChrName: *cough* *cough*
engSearchText: *cough* *cough*
jpnChrName: ゲホッ、ゲホッ！
jpnSearchText: ゲホッ、ゲホッ！

engChrName: You sneaky little...!
engSearchText: You sneaky little...!
jpnChrName: 小賢しい真似しやがって……！
jpnSearchText: 小賢しい真似しやがって……！

engChrName: How the hell did you repel them both?!
engSearchText: How the hell did you repel them both?!
jpnChrName: ２つともはじき返すとか、 どんな腕してんだよ……！
jpnSearchText:
２つともはじき返すとか、
どんな腕してんだよ……！

engChrName: What are we gonna do now?!
engSearchText: What are we gonna do now?!
jpnChrName: チッ、どうすんだよ……！
jpnSearchText: チッ、どうすんだよ……！

engChrName: Looks like those weren't bombs after all.
engSearchText: Looks like those weren't bombs after all.
jpnChrName: コイツは爆弾じゃなかったみてえだな。
jpnSearchText: コイツは爆弾じゃなかったみてえだな。

engChrName: They were smoke grenades full of scents that attract monsters!
engSearchText:
They were smoke grenades full of scents that
attract monsters!
jpnChrName: 恐らくは、魔獣が好む臭気が配合された 煙幕弾の類（たぐい）……！
jpnSearchText:
恐らくは、魔獣が好む臭気が配合された
煙幕弾の類（たぐい）……！

engChrName: There sure are a lot of them...
engSearchText: There sure are a lot of them...
jpnChrName: 結構な数が集まってしまいましたね……
jpnSearchText: 結構な数が集まってしまいましたね……

engChrName: How's that for some just deserts?
engSearchText: How's that for some just deserts?
jpnChrName: だがまあ、いい気味じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: だがまあ、いい気味じゃねえか。

engChrName: Bah! We're still making for the temple—we've just gotta lose these things first!
engSearchText:
Bah! We're still making for the temple—we've just
gotta lose these things first!
jpnChrName: くっ……！　さっさと魔獣を撒いて 教会の奥に向かうぞ！
jpnSearchText:
くっ……！　さっさと魔獣を撒いて
教会の奥に向かうぞ！

engChrName: Hmm... Well, ain't this a mess.
engSearchText: Hmm... Well, ain't this a mess.
jpnChrName: さて……こいつはちと面倒な事になったな。
jpnSearchText: さて……こいつはちと面倒な事になったな。

engChrName: (We're all strong enough to take these monsters out in record time if we want to.)
engSearchText:
(We're all strong enough to take these monsters out
in record time if we want to.)
jpnChrName: （俺達の腕なら大急ぎで   魔獣を倒しちまう事もできるだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（俺達の腕なら大急ぎで
魔獣を倒しちまう事もできるだろう。）

engChrName: (Then we can take all the thieves into custody, too. I think that's the most respectable way to handle this.)
engSearchText:
(Then we can take all the thieves into custody, too.
I think that's the most respectable way to
handle this.)
jpnChrName: （その後で、考古学者達をとっ捕まえる……   これが一番真っ当な選択肢だ。）
jpnSearchText:
（その後で、考古学者達をとっ捕まえる……
これが一番真っ当な選択肢だ。）

engChrName: (But we could also just let 'em wear each other down for a while first...)
engSearchText:
(But we could also just let 'em wear each other down
for a while first...)
jpnChrName: （もしくは、魔獣たちと考古学者たちが   お互い削り合った所を狙うか……？）
jpnSearchText:
（もしくは、魔獣たちと考古学者たちが
お互い削り合った所を狙うか……？）

engChrName: Take the monsters out first! Then we'll apprehend these idiots!
engSearchText:
Take the monsters out first! Then we'll apprehend
these idiots!
jpnChrName: まずは急いで魔獣を倒しちまうぞ！ その後にこいつらを拘束する──！
jpnSearchText:
まずは急いで魔獣を倒しちまうぞ！
その後にこいつらを拘束する──！

engChrName: Understood!
engSearchText: Understood!
jpnChrName: 了解しました──！
jpnSearchText: 了解しました──！

engChrName: You have my full support!
engSearchText: You have my full support!
jpnChrName: わたくしも全力で援護いたします！
jpnSearchText: わたくしも全力で援護いたします！

engChrName: If they want to fight the monsters, let 'em! We're getting to the temple!
engSearchText:
If they want to fight the monsters, let 'em!
We're getting to the temple!
jpnChrName: よし、今の内に寺院の方へ……！
jpnSearchText: よし、今の内に寺院の方へ……！

engChrName: Ha. That's convenient. For us, anyway.
engSearchText: Ha. That's convenient. For us, anyway.
jpnChrName: ハッ、こいつは都合がいいじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、こいつは都合がいいじゃねえか。

engChrName: We've got to take care of these things as quickly as we can so we can go after them!
engSearchText:
We've got to take care of these things as quickly as we
can so we can go after them!
jpnChrName: あの人たちを捕らえる為にも、 まずは邪魔な魔獣を退けてみせます──！
jpnSearchText:
あの人たちを捕らえる為にも、
まずは邪魔な魔獣を退けてみせます──！

engChrName: Y'know what? We're gonna capitalize on their dumb mistake.
engSearchText:
Y'know what? We're gonna capitalize on their
dumb mistake.
jpnChrName: 丁度いい、この状況を 利用させてもらおうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
丁度いい、この状況を
利用させてもらおうじゃねえか。

engChrName: Let's wait for the monsters to wear them out. Then we'll strike!
engSearchText:
Let's wait for the monsters to wear them out.
Then we'll strike!
jpnChrName: 考古学者たちと魔獣が戦って 疲弊した所を、俺達が突くぞ！
jpnSearchText:
考古学者たちと魔獣が戦って
疲弊した所を、俺達が突くぞ！

engChrName: Works for me. Efficiency first, baby.
engSearchText: Works for me. Efficiency first, baby.
jpnChrName: いいんじゃねえか？　効率的でよ。
jpnSearchText: いいんじゃねえか？　効率的でよ。

engChrName: Are you sure that's okay? It feels like we're doing something a bit...immoral.
engSearchText:
Are you sure that's okay? It feels like we're doing
something a bit...immoral.
jpnChrName: なんだか、悪い事をしているような 気持ちにもなりますけど……
jpnSearchText:
なんだか、悪い事をしているような
気持ちにもなりますけど……

engChrName: Grr! So that's your play, is it?!
engSearchText: Grr! So that's your play, is it?!
jpnChrName: クソッ、これが狙いだったのか……！
jpnSearchText: クソッ、これが狙いだったのか……！

engChrName: What did we do to deserve this?!
engSearchText: What did we do to deserve this?!
jpnChrName: ど、どうしてこんな事に……！？
jpnSearchText: ど、どうしてこんな事に……！？

engChrName: Damn it. We've got no choice but to fight!
engSearchText: Damn it. We've got no choice but to fight!
jpnChrName: クソッ、こうなったらやるしかねえ！
jpnSearchText: クソッ、こうなったらやるしかねえ！

engChrName: Fine, but they're gonna PAY for this after we're done!
engSearchText: Fine, but they're gonna PAY for this after we're done!
jpnChrName: 仕方ねえ、後で絶対にあいつ等も 袋叩きにしてやる……！
jpnSearchText:
仕方ねえ、後で絶対にあいつ等も
袋叩きにしてやる……！

engChrName: You'll regret this, spriggan!
engSearchText: You'll regret this, spriggan!
jpnChrName: 後で覚えてろよ《裏解決屋》……！
jpnSearchText: 後で覚えてろよ《裏解決屋》……！

engChrName: The monsters are gradually gaining more of an upper hand over the criminals.
engSearchText:
The monsters are gradually gaining more of an upper
hand over the criminals.
jpnChrName: ……考古学者の方々が 徐々に魔獣に押し切られてきましたね。
jpnSearchText:
……考古学者の方々が
徐々に魔獣に押し切られてきましたね。

engChrName: Yeah. I'm not gonna let any of 'em die, so we should probably jump in now.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I'm not gonna let any of 'em die, so we should
probably jump in now.
jpnChrName: ああ、死なせるつもりもねえし そろそろ間に入ってやるとするか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、死なせるつもりもねえし
そろそろ間に入ってやるとするか。

engChrName: *pant* We're so close to our goal! So close!
engSearchText: *pant* We're so close to our goal! So close!
jpnChrName: はぁ……はぁ……！ あと少しで寺院の地下へ行けるというのに！
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……はぁ……！
あと少しで寺院の地下へ行けるというのに！

engChrName: Wh-What are we gonna do?!
engSearchText: Wh-What are we gonna do?!
jpnChrName: ど、どうすんだよ長男のアニキ……！
jpnSearchText: ど、どうすんだよ長男のアニキ……！

engChrName: They've got us cornered!
engSearchText: They've got us cornered!
jpnChrName: 後がねえじゃねえか、 どうすればいいんだよ……！？
jpnSearchText:
後がねえじゃねえか、
どうすればいいんだよ……！？

engChrName: I can't believe those guys ruined our whole plan!
engSearchText: I can't believe those guys ruined our whole plan!
jpnChrName: あいつらのせいで計画が台無しじゃねえか……！
jpnSearchText: あいつらのせいで計画が台無しじゃねえか……！

engChrName: There's no way in hell that I'm gonna die here! No way!
engSearchText:
There's no way in hell that I'm gonna die here!
No way!
jpnChrName: ここでくたばるなんて絶対にごめんだ──！
jpnSearchText: ここでくたばるなんて絶対にごめんだ──！

engChrName: Where'd all that spunk you had earlier go, punks?
engSearchText: Where'd all that spunk you had earlier go, punks?
jpnChrName: よう、さっきまでの威勢の良さは どっか行っちまったみてえだな？
jpnSearchText:
よう、さっきまでの威勢の良さは
どっか行っちまったみてえだな？

engChrName: Why'd you interfere? What's your game now?!
engSearchText: Why'd you interfere? What's your game now?!
jpnChrName: お前たち……！　どういうつもりだ！？
jpnSearchText: お前たち……！　どういうつもりだ！？

engChrName: We're not evil, y'know. We're not actually gonna sit back and watch you get killed.
engSearchText:
We're not evil, y'know. We're not actually gonna sit
back and watch you get killed.
jpnChrName: 俺達だって外道じゃねえんだ。 ここで見殺しにすんのは後味がわりぃからな。
jpnSearchText:
俺達だって外道じゃねえんだ。
ここで見殺しにすんのは後味がわりぃからな。

engChrName: Besides, I've got another use in mind for you guys.
engSearchText: Besides, I've got another use in mind for you guys.
jpnChrName: それに、アンタ達には他の使い道がありそうだ。
jpnSearchText: それに、アンタ達には他の使い道がありそうだ。

engChrName: Tsk. You just try! We've still got some fight left in us yet!
engSearchText:
Tsk. You just try! We've still got some fight left in
us yet!
jpnChrName: チッ、俺達をどうこうしようってんなら こっちも容赦しねえぞ！
jpnSearchText:
チッ、俺達をどうこうしようってんなら
こっちも容赦しねえぞ！

engChrName: We'll do more than try!
engSearchText: We'll do more than try!
jpnChrName: はい、まとめて相手をさせてもらうだけですっ！
jpnSearchText: はい、まとめて相手をさせてもらうだけですっ！

engChrName: Tsk. I can't believe they managed to take out that many all at once...
engSearchText:
Tsk. I can't believe they managed to take out that
many all at once...
jpnChrName: チッ──あいつら、この数の魔獣でさえも 倒してしまうとはな。
jpnSearchText:
チッ──あいつら、この数の魔獣でさえも
倒してしまうとはな。

engChrName: But now that the monsters are out of our way, it's time to go claim our spoils!
engSearchText:
But now that the monsters are out of our way, it's
time to go claim our spoils!
jpnChrName: だが邪魔な魔獣がいなくなった今が好機だ、 今のうちに七耀寺院の地下へ──！
jpnSearchText:
だが邪魔な魔獣がいなくなった今が好機だ、
今のうちに七耀寺院の地下へ──！

engChrName: I am afraid you will not be going anywhere.
engSearchText: I am afraid you will not be going anywhere.
jpnChrName: お急ぎの所申し訳ありませんが、 先へ行かせはしませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
お急ぎの所申し訳ありませんが、
先へ行かせはしませんよ。

engChrName: Sorry for the wait. Now it's your turn.
engSearchText: Sorry for the wait. Now it's your turn.
jpnChrName: さてと……待たせて悪かったな。 次はアンタらの番だぜ？
jpnSearchText:
さてと……待たせて悪かったな。
次はアンタらの番だぜ？

engChrName: N-No way...
engSearchText: N-No way...
jpnChrName: ま、まじかよ──！？
jpnSearchText: ま、まじかよ──！？

engChrName: Hmph. You guys think you're so damn tough!
engSearchText: Hmph. You guys think you're so damn tough!
jpnChrName: クソッ、調子に乗りやがって！
jpnSearchText: クソッ、調子に乗りやがって！

engChrName: Have it your way! You're gonna see what we're really made of!
engSearchText:
Have it your way! You're gonna see what we're really
made of!
jpnChrName: ここまで来たら仕方ねえ…… いいぜ、やってやるよ！
jpnSearchText:
ここまで来たら仕方ねえ……
いいぜ、やってやるよ！

engChrName: Fighting those monsters must've worn them down. This should be easy!
engSearchText:
Fighting those monsters must've worn them down.
This should be easy!
jpnChrName: 連中は魔獣の相手をして弱ってるはずだ。 一気に畳みかけるぞ──！
jpnSearchText:
連中は魔獣の相手をして弱ってるはずだ。
一気に畳みかけるぞ──！

engChrName: Yeah! Let's do this!
engSearchText: Yeah! Let's do this!
jpnChrName: おう、やってやるよ！
jpnSearchText: おう、やってやるよ！

engChrName: Curses... Our scheme wasn't supposed to go like this...
engSearchText:
Curses... Our scheme wasn't supposed to go
like this...
jpnChrName: クソッ……まさかここで 俺達が敗れちまうとは……
jpnSearchText:
クソッ……まさかここで
俺達が敗れちまうとは……

engChrName: How can they be so strong when half of them are just kids?
engSearchText:
How can they be so strong when half of them are
just kids?
jpnChrName: ガキが多いくせに強すぎるだろ…………
jpnSearchText: ガキが多いくせに強すぎるだろ…………

engChrName: Heehee! That's what you get for judging by appearances!
engSearchText:
Heehee! That's what you get for judging
by appearances!
jpnChrName: ふふん、見た目で人を 判断しない方が良いですよっ！
jpnSearchText:
ふふん、見た目で人を
判断しない方が良いですよっ！

engChrName: Heh. You'd think they'd know better, having so much experience bein' other people.
engSearchText:
Heh. You'd think they'd know better, having so much
experience bein' other people.
jpnChrName: ハッ、言い得て妙じゃねえか。 変装好きのこいつらには特にな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、言い得て妙じゃねえか。
変装好きのこいつらには特にな。

engChrName: Heh. You'd think they'd know better, especially our star actor over here.
engSearchText:
Heh. You'd think they'd know better, especially our
star actor over here.
jpnChrName: ハッ、言い得て妙じゃねえか。 変装好きのこいつには特にな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、言い得て妙じゃねえか。
変装好きのこいつには特にな。

engChrName: So, what do we do now that we've caught them?
engSearchText: So, what do we do now that we've caught them?
jpnChrName: で……捕らえたはいいが、 この後こいつらをどうすんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
で……捕らえたはいいが、
この後こいつらをどうすんだよ。

engChrName: The Devancy Brothers are wanted criminals in the capital.
engSearchText:
The Devancy Brothers are wanted criminals in
the capital.
jpnChrName: ディバンシー兄弟ってのは確か 首都の指名手配犯なんだったよな。
jpnSearchText:
ディバンシー兄弟ってのは確か
首都の指名手配犯なんだったよな。

engChrName: But since one of 'em was our client for this job, we basically wound up doing all this for free.
engSearchText:
But since one of 'em was our client for this job, we
basically wound up doing all this for free.
jpnChrName: 今回の依頼がコイツである以上、 このままだと俺達はタダ働きになっちまう訳だ。
jpnSearchText:
今回の依頼がコイツである以上、
このままだと俺達はタダ働きになっちまう訳だ。

engChrName: That's why I'm thinkin' we should hand 'em over to the police and collect the bounty. That way, at least we'll get our due.
engSearchText:
That's why I'm thinkin' we should hand 'em over to
the police and collect the bounty. That way, at least
we'll get our due.
jpnChrName: そこでだ──警察に突き出して、 依頼代わりに報奨金（バウンティ）を頂こうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
そこでだ──警察に突き出して、
依頼代わりに報奨金（バウンティ）を頂こうじゃねえか。

engChrName: I feel like I've heard the name 'Devancy Brothers' somewhere before. What about you guys?
engSearchText:
I feel like I've heard the name 'Devancy Brothers'
somewhere before. What about you guys?
jpnChrName: そういやディバンシー兄弟っていやあ どこかで聞いた事がある気がすんだよな……
jpnSearchText:
そういやディバンシー兄弟っていやあ
どこかで聞いた事がある気がすんだよな……

engChrName: I took the liberty of looking them up in Marduk's database.
engSearchText:
I took the liberty of looking them up in
Marduk's database.
jpnChrName: ＭＫ社のデータベースで 検索をかけさせて頂きました。
jpnSearchText:
ＭＫ社のデータベースで
検索をかけさせて頂きました。

engChrName: They appear to be a group of wanted criminals that operate out of Edith.
engSearchText:
They appear to be a group of wanted criminals that
operate out of Edith.
jpnChrName: ディバンシー兄弟──どうやら首都で 指名手配されている犯罪グループのようですね。
jpnSearchText:
ディバンシー兄弟──どうやら首都で
指名手配されている犯罪グループのようですね。

engChrName: So they came all the way from the capital to cause trouble?
engSearchText:
So they came all the way from the capital to
cause trouble?
jpnChrName: 首都からサルバッドへ来て 犯罪を働いていたという事ですか……
jpnSearchText:
首都からサルバッドへ来て
犯罪を働いていたという事ですか……

engChrName: I'm guessing their plan was to take advantage of the distractions around the film festival to line their pockets.
engSearchText:
I'm guessing their plan was to take advantage of the
distractions around the film festival to line
their pockets.
jpnChrName: どうせ、映画祭の混乱に乗じてサルバッドで 甘い蜜を吸おうって魂胆だったんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
どうせ、映画祭の混乱に乗じてサルバッドで
甘い蜜を吸おうって魂胆だったんだろ。

engChrName: That settles it, then. We're handin' them over to the cops.
engSearchText:
That settles it, then. We're handin' them over to
the cops.
jpnChrName: それなら決まりだな── こいつらは警察に引き渡す。
jpnSearchText:
それなら決まりだな──
こいつらは警察に引き渡す。

engChrName: Since one of 'em was our client for this job, we basically wound up doing all this for free.
engSearchText:
Since one of 'em was our client for this job, we
basically wound up doing all this for free.
jpnChrName: 今回の依頼がコイツである以上、 このままだと俺達はタダ働きになっちまう。
jpnSearchText:
今回の依頼がコイツである以上、
このままだと俺達はタダ働きになっちまう。

engChrName: But if we hand 'em in to the boys with badges, we'll be able to collect a bounty. So at least then we're gettin' paid.
engSearchText:
But if we hand 'em in to the boys with badges, we'll
be able to collect a bounty. So at least then we're
gettin' paid.
jpnChrName: それなら依頼代わりに、指名手配犯を 捕らえた報奨金（バウンティ）を頂こうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
それなら依頼代わりに、指名手配犯を
捕らえた報奨金（バウンティ）を頂こうじゃねえか。

engChrName: Bounty hunting's another part of being a spriggan, after all.
engSearchText:
Bounty hunting's another part of being a spriggan,
after all.
jpnChrName: 一応、賞金稼ぎ（バウンティハンター）も 裏解決屋の業務の一環なんでな。
jpnSearchText:
一応、賞金稼ぎ（バウンティハンター）も
裏解決屋の業務の一環なんでな。

engChrName: Fine by me. I'm not too big on busting my ass for nothing in return.
engSearchText:
Fine by me. I'm not too big on busting my ass for
nothing in return.
jpnChrName: ま、それくらいの見返りがねえと ここまで付き合った甲斐がねえしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、それくらいの見返りがねえと
ここまで付き合った甲斐がねえしな。

engChrName: Ahaha... What you're saying is entirely logical and legal, and yet somehow I feel guilty about it all the same...
engSearchText:
Ahaha... What you're saying is entirely logical and
legal, and yet somehow I feel guilty about it all
the same...
jpnChrName: あはは……正しい事を言ってるはずなのに 悪そうに聞こえちゃいますね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……正しい事を言ってるはずなのに
悪そうに聞こえちゃいますね。

engChrName: So this, too, is a facet of the spriggan way? How very educational.
engSearchText:
So this, too, is a facet of the spriggan way? How
very educational.
jpnChrName: ふふ、これもまた裏解決屋の流儀ですか。 勉強になります。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、これもまた裏解決屋の流儀ですか。
勉強になります。

engChrName: In any case, I will contact the local police department right away.
engSearchText:
In any case, I will contact the local police department
right away.
jpnChrName: それでは早速、わたくしの方で 警察へ通報させて頂きましょう。
jpnSearchText:
それでは早速、わたくしの方で
警察へ通報させて頂きましょう。

engChrName: I remember the route we took here well, so I should be able to guide them down here in short order.
engSearchText:
I remember the route we took here well, so I should
be able to guide them down here in short order.
jpnChrName: 地下水路のルートも把握済みなので、 警察の方々を迅速に誘導できるかと。
jpnSearchText:
地下水路のルートも把握済みなので、
警察の方々を迅速に誘導できるかと。

engChrName: Thanks.
engSearchText: Thanks.
jpnChrName: ああ、よろしく頼む。
jpnSearchText: ああ、よろしく頼む。

engChrName: Risette contacted the authorities, and before long, armed officers arrived to take the men into custody.
engSearchText:
Risette contacted the authorities, and before long,
armed officers arrived to take the men into custody.
jpnChrName: その後──リゼットの通報によって 程なくして地下水路へと警察が駆け付けた。
jpnSearchText:
その後──リゼットの通報によって
程なくして地下水路へと警察が駆け付けた。

engChrName: After learning that they had apprehended none other than the infamous Devancy Brothers, the police were extremely grateful...
engSearchText:
After learning that they had apprehended none other
than the infamous Devancy Brothers, the police were
extremely grateful...
jpnChrName: 相手が指名手配犯の『ディバンシー兄弟』と伝えると 警察からいたく感謝され──
jpnSearchText:
相手が指名手配犯の『ディバンシー兄弟』と伝えると
警察からいたく感謝され──

engChrName: And after they all returned to the entrance, Van and the others were given the bounty they wanted.
engSearchText:
And after they all returned to the entrance, Van and
the others were given the bounty they wanted.
jpnChrName: 入口に戻ったところで警察から報奨金を貰い、 ヴァン達は依頼を成し遂げたのだった。
jpnSearchText:
入口に戻ったところで警察から報奨金を貰い、
ヴァン達は依頼を成し遂げたのだった。

engChrName: Quest Archaeological Expedition completed!
engSearchText: Quest Archaeological Expedition completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【地下水路の考古学的調査】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>地下水路の考古学的調査<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。
